topics.title: Describe the Weather
topics.prompt: Talk about the weather in your city during different seasons.
topics.hint: 請描述你所在城市在不同季節的天氣情況，可以說冷熱、下雨或晴天等。
topics.sample: In my city, summers are very hot and sunny, but winters are cold and sometimes snowy. Spring is cool with a little rain, and autumn is nice and breezy.

topics.title: Reacting to Surprising Events
topics.prompt: Describe a time you were surprised by something unexpected.
topics.hint: 分享一次你遇到意外事情時的感受，可以描述當時場景和你的反應。
topics.sample: One day, I saw a big dog in the park. I was surprised because it suddenly appeared behind me. I was a little scared but then I smiled because the dog was friendly.

topics.title: Talking about Animals
topics.prompt: Describe your favorite animal and explain why you like it.
topics.hint: 請描述你喜歡的動物，說明牠長什麼樣子、習性，還有你喜歡的原因。
topics.sample: My favorite animal is the panda. It is black and white and very cute. I like pandas because they are calm and eat bamboo.

topics.title: Expressing Feelings of Cold
topics.prompt: Explain how you feel and what you do when it is very cold outside.
topics.hint: 分享天氣很冷時你的感受，還有你通常會穿什麼或做什麼保暖。
topics.sample: When it is freezing outside, I feel very cold and my hands get numb. I usually wear a warm coat, gloves, and a hat to stay warm.

topics.title: Describing a Group Activity
topics.prompt: Talk about a group activity you enjoy with your friends or family.
topics.hint: 說說你與朋友或家人一起做的活動，可以講活動的內容和你的感受。
topics.sample: I like singing with my friends during parties. We sing songs together and have a lot of fun. It makes me happy to share music with others.

topics.title: Giving Directions
topics.prompt: Explain how to find a place you know well, using simple directions.
topics.hint: 用英文簡單描述如何去一個你很熟悉的地方，例如從學校到超市。
topics.sample: To get to the library, go straight for two blocks, then turn left. The library is next to the park.

topics.title: Sharing a Story About Sleep
topics.prompt: Describe your bedtime routine or a memorable sleep experience.
topics.hint: 講述你睡覺的習慣，或是有趣的睡覺經驗，可以包含感覺和動作。
topics.sample: Every night I read a book before sleep. One time, I fell asleep while reading and had a funny dream about flying.

topics.title: Describing Sounds Around You
topics.prompt: Describe some common sounds you hear during the day and how they make you feel.
topics.hint: 描述你日常聽到的聲音，例如鳥叫或車聲，並說說這些聲音帶給你的感覺。
topics.sample: I often hear birds singing in the morning. Their songs make me feel calm and happy. Sometimes, I also hear cars, which can be noisy.

topics.title: Talking About Saying Goodbye
topics.prompt: Explain how you say goodbye to your friends or family and what you feel during goodbyes.
topics.hint: 分享你和朋友或家人道別的方式與心情，可以是打招呼或離開時的感受。
topics.sample: When I say goodbye to my friends, I usually wave and say 'see you later.' I feel a little sad but happy to see them again soon.

topics.title: Imagining a Friendly Bear
topics.prompt: Imagine meeting a bear that is friendly. Describe what happens and how you feel.
topics.hint: 想像遇到一隻友善的熊，描述你們的互動和你的感受。
topics.sample: I met a friendly bear in the forest. It was big but kind. We sat together and I felt safe and amazed by this unusual meeting.
